short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Display feedly text in multi-column layout.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An extension that changes the entries' display style to multi-column display.

Auto changing 1 to 3 columns depenging on your browser size.
